Patient.title: Patient
Patient.description: Represents a patient registered in the MoDoc application, including their personal details and contact information.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Patient entity.

externalAuthId.description: Reference to the patient's unique identifier in the external authentication system.

email.description: The patient's email address, used for communication and identification.

profileImageUrl.description: URL to the patient's profile picture.

addressLine1.description: The first line of the patient's physical address.

addressLine2.description: The second line of the patient's physical address, if applicable.

city.description: The city component of the patient's address.

stateProvince.description: The state or province component of the patient's address.

postalCode.description: The postal or zip code component of the patient's address.

country.description: The country component of the patient's address.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the patient profile was first created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the patient profile was last updated.

Doctor.title: Doctor
Doctor.description: Represents a doctor registered in the MoDoc application, including their professional profile, specializations, and availability.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Doctor entity.

externalAuthId.description: Reference to the doctor's unique identifier in the external authentication system.

email.description: The doctor's email address, used for communication and identification.

hospitalId.description: The ID of the hospital where the doctor is affiliated.

specializations.description: A list of medical specializations the doctor holds (e.g., 'Cardiology', 'Pediatrics').

bio.description: A short biographical description of the doctor, highlighting their experience and approach.

profileImageUrl.description: URL to the doctor's profile picture.

licenseNumber.description: The doctor's medical license number, for verification purposes.

averageRating.description: The doctor's average rating based on patient feedback.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the doctor profile was first created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the doctor profile was last updated.

Hospital.title: Hospital
Hospital.description: Represents a physical hospital facility affiliated with the MoDoc network.

DoctorAvailability.title: DoctorAvailability
DoctorAvailability.description: Defines a recurring availability pattern for a doctor (e.g., available every Monday from 9 AM to 5 PM).

id.description: Unique identifier for the DoctorAvailability entity.

doctorId.description: Reference to the Doctor this availability pattern belongs to. (Relationship: Doctor 1:N DoctorAvailability)

dayOfWeek.description: The day of the week for this availability (e.g., 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday').

startTime.description: The start time of the availability slot in 24-hour HH:MM format (e.g., '09:00').

endTime.description: The end time of the availability slot in 24-hour HH:MM format (e.g., '17:00').

isActive.description: Indicates if this availability pattern is currently active and being used by the doctor.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when this availability record was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when this availability record was last updated.

Appointment.title: Appointment
Appointment.description: Represents a scheduled virtual consultation between a patient and a doctor.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Appointment entity.

patientId.description: Reference to the Patient who booked this appointment. (Relationship: Patient 1:N Appointment)

doctorId.description: Reference to the Doctor scheduled for this appointment. (Relationship: Doctor 1:N Appointment)

startTime.description: The scheduled start date and time of the appointment.

endTime.description: The scheduled end date and time of the appointment.

status.description: The current status of the appointment (e.g., 'scheduled', 'completed', 'cancelled', 'pending').

reasonForAppointment.description: The patient's stated reason or concern for booking the appointment.

consultationLink.description: The URL for the secure video consultation session.

patientNotes.description: Notes added by the patient related to the appointment before or during the consultation.

doctorNotes.description: Notes added by the doctor related to the patient's condition or consultation outcome.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the appointment was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the appointment record was last updated.

Conversation.title: Conversation
Conversation.description: Represents a secure messaging thread between a single patient and a single doctor.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Conversation entity.

patientId.description: Reference to the Patient participating in this conversation. (Relationship: Patient 1:N Conversation)

doctorId.description: Reference to the Doctor participating in this conversation. (Relationship: Doctor 1:N Conversation)

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the conversation was initiated.

lastMessageAt.description: Timestamp of the most recent message sent in this conversation.

status.description: The current status of the conversation (e.g., 'open', 'closed', 'pendingDoctorResponse', 'pendingPatientResponse').

subject.description: An optional subject or title that describes the conversation's topic.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents an individual text message sent within a secure conversation between a patient and a doctor.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Message entity.

conversationId.description: Reference to the Conversation this message belongs to. (Relationship: Conversation 1:N Message)

senderId.description: The ID of the sender (either Patient.id or Doctor.id). Application logic determines the specific entity type. (Relationship: Patient/Doctor 1:N Message)

senderType.description: The type of the sender, indicating whether it's a 'Patient' or 'Doctor'.

content.description: The actual text content of the message.

timestamp.description: Timestamp indicating when the message was sent.

isReadByPatient.description: Indicates if the message has been read by the patient.

isReadByDoctor.description: Indicates if the message has been read by the doctor.

SymptomAssessment.title: SymptomAssessment
SymptomAssessment.description: Stores the patient's input and the AI's guidance from the AI Symptom Assessment Tool.

id.description: Unique identifier for the SymptomAssessment entity.

patientId.description: Reference to the Patient who performed the symptom assessment. (Relationship: Patient 1:N SymptomAssessment)

inputSymptoms.description: The symptoms or health concerns provided by the patient to the AI tool.

aiGuidance.description: The general guidance or information provided by the AI based on the input symptoms.

suggestedSpecialties.description: A list of suggested medical specializations or doctor types provided by the AI.

timestamp.description: Timestamp indicating when the symptom assessment was performed.

Admin.title: Admin
Admin.description: Represents an administrative user with privileges to monitor various aspects of the MoDoc application and its users.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Admin entity.

externalAuthId.description: Reference to the admin user's unique identifier in the external authentication system.

role.description: The role assigned to the admin user (e.g., 'SuperAdmin', 'SupportAgent', 'Monitor'), determining their access and permissions.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the admin profile was first created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the admin profile was last updated.

definition.description: Individual patient profiles. Accessible only by the owning patient.

params.name: patientId
params.description: The unique identifier of the patient.

definition.description: Individual doctor profiles. Publicly readable for discovery.

params.name: doctorId
params.description: The unique identifier of the doctor.

params.name: hospitalId
params.description: The unique identifier of the hospital.

definition.description: Specific availability patterns for a doctor. Publicly readable.

params.name: doctorId
params.description: The unique identifier of the doctor.

params.name: availabilityId
params.description: The unique identifier for a specific availability slot.

params.name: appointmentId
params.description: The unique identifier for a scheduled appointment.

params.name: conversationId
params.description: The unique identifier for a messaging conversation.

params.name: conversationId
params.description: The unique identifier of the parent conversation.

params.name: messageId
params.description: The unique identifier for a specific message.

definition.description: Patient's history of AI symptom assessments.

params.name: patientId
params.description: The unique identifier of the patient.

params.name: assessmentId
params.description: The unique identifier for a specific symptom assessment record.

params.name: adminId
params.description: The unique identifier of the admin.

firestore.reasoning: Standard structure with added Hospital entity for location-based facility discovery and hospitalId for doctor affiliation.
